item.title: 中国科技公司借 DeepSeek 反弹之势筹集更多资金
item.description: 中国科技公司利用 DeepSeek 推动的 1 万亿美元涨势，以及中国政府对这一曾经饱受打击的行业采取的较为缓和的立场，推动股票融资，可谓众望所归。【原文：The stars are aligned for Chinese technology companies to boost stock financing, capitalizing on a DeepSeek-driven $1 trillion rally and Beijing’s softer stance on the once-battered sector.】

item.title: 俄罗斯最繁忙港口的石油出口不受制裁限制
item.description: 俄罗斯太平洋主要码头的原油出口保持强劲，因为托运人和贸易商又一次绕过了美国的新一轮限制，使用了新的船只来保持桶装原油的运输。【原文：Crude-oil exports from Russia’s main Pacific terminal remain robust as shippers and traders — yet again — work around a fresh batch of curbs from the US, enlisting a new roster of vessels to keep barrels moving.】

item.title: 印尼内阁首次改组，普拉博沃撤换助手
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托在去年上任后的首次内阁改组中任命布莱恩-尤利亚托（Brian Yuliarto）为新的高等教育、科学和技术部长。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto named Brian Yuliarto as the new higher education, science and technology minister in his first cabinet reshuffle after taking office last year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长帕内塔称经济疲软比预期严重
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员法比奥-帕内塔说，欧元区经济低迷的持续时间比预期的要长，他警告说，迄今为止弹性十足的就业市场可能正在出现裂痕。【原文：The euro zone’s bout of economic sluggishness is lasting longer than anticipated, European Central Bank Governing Council member Fabio Panetta said, warning that the so far resilient jobs market may be cracking.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机瞄准伏尔加河地区俄罗斯石油公司 Syzran 炼油厂
item.description: 据当地州长 Vyacheslav Fedorishchev 称，乌克兰无人机一夜之间袭击了俄罗斯伏尔加河地区的 Syzran 炼油厂。【原文：Ukrainian drones struck the Syzran refinery in Russia’s Volga region overnight, according to the local governor Vyacheslav Fedorishchev.】

item.title: 分析师称印尼暂停加息为印尼盾提供支持
item.description: 分析师说，印尼央行维持利率不变后，印尼盾可能会得到一些缓解，但由于担心经济增长放缓，当地股市可能会重拾跌势。【原文：The Indonesian rupiah may get some relief after the central bank kept its interest rate unchanged, though local stocks are likely to resume their decline amid concerns over slowing economic growth, analysts said.】

item.title: 华尔街对特朗普回归的兴奋程度不断变化
item.description:
在本期特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论银行家对新政府的担忧。【原文：

item.title: 花旗、瑞银为贝恩收购 Apleona 筹借 20 亿欧元债务
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）和瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正在组织约 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）的资金，以支持贝恩资本（Bain Capital）收购德国设施管理公司 Apleona Group GmbH —；这是近年来并购案稀少的情况下达成的一项罕见交易。【原文：Citigroup Inc. and UBS Group AG are organizing about €2 billion ($2.1 billion) of funding to back Bain Capital’s acquisition of German facility-management company Apleona Group GmbH — a rare deal amid a dearth of acquisitions in recent years.】

item.title: 开普敦风灾导致 Transnet 在旺季长期受阻
item.description: 南非 Transnet SOC 有限公司正在采取措施，克服开普敦集装箱码头在水果出口旺季期间受到的强风影响。【原文：South Africa’s Transnet SOC Ltd. is taking measures to overcome strong winds at the Cape Town Container Terminal that have dented its performance during a peak season for fruit exports.】

item.title: Monde Nissin 可能注销肉类替代品部门的 1.26 亿美元资产
item.description: 菲律宾最大的方便面生产商 Monde Nissin Corp. 因肉类替代品业务陷入困境，可能在 2024 年计提高达 1.26 亿美元的减值费用。【原文：Monde Nissin Corp., the Philippines’ largest instant noodle maker, may take an impairment charge of as much as $126 million for 2024 as it struggles with its meat-alternative business.】

item.title: 奥拉诺称铀价反弹或将重振采矿项目
item.description: Orano SA 首席执行官尼古拉斯-梅斯（Nicolas Maes）表示，由于放射性金属价格反弹以及核燃料服务提高了 2024 年的收益，Orano SA 正在考虑恢复在纳米比亚开采铀矿的项目。【原文：Orano SA is considering reviving a project to mine uranium in Namibia as rebounding prices for the radioactive metal as well as nuclear-fuel services have boosted 2024 earnings, Chief Executive Officer Nicolas Maes said.】

item.title: 汇丰旗下恒生银行香港物业减值激增
item.description: 汇丰控股公司控制的香港贷款机构恒生银行有限公司录得的商业房地产信贷减值激增，因为香港的经济困境开始波及本地贷款机构。【原文：Hang Seng Bank Ltd., a Hong Kong lender controlled by HSBC Holdings Plc, recorded a surge in credit impairment on commercial real estate as the city’s economic struggles are starting to spill over on local lenders.】

item.title: 瑞典房东 SBB 考虑对其社区物业分支进行首次公开募股
item.description: 瑞典房东瑞典储蓄银行（SBB）在继续寻找解决到期债券债务的方法的同时，也在研究为其社区物业投资组合筹集资金的可行性。【原文：Swedish landlord SBB is looking into the feasibility of raising equity against its portfolio of community properties as it continues to find ways to tackle maturing bond debt.】

item.title: 格伦科尔正在研究是否将主要上市地从伦敦迁出
item.description: Glencore Plc 表示，其首次上市的最佳地点 "仍在研究中"，这加剧了人们对这一迄今为止最受瞩目的英国交易所退市事件的猜测。【原文：Glencore Plc said the optimal location for its primary listing “remains under study,” fueling speculation about what would be the most high-profile exit from the UK exchange to date.】

item.title: 印尼保持关键利率稳定以支撑印尼盾，风险上升
item.description: 印尼央行维持利率不变，暂停了宽松周期，抛开了对经济增长的担忧，以防止美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税威胁导致货币疲软。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank held rates unchanged, pausing an easing cycle and setting aside concerns about economic growth to preempt any currency weakness from US President Donald Trump’s tariff threats.】

item.title: 格伦科尔公布利润下滑，煤炭和钴价格暴跌
item.description: 全球最大的大宗商品贸易商嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）公布全年利润下滑，原因是其一些最重要的材料价格下滑。【原文：Glencore Plc posted a slide in full-year profit as the world’s biggest commodity trader battles slumping prices for some of its most important materials.】

item.title: 增值税冲击私立学校，英国通胀率飙升至 10 个月新高
item.description: 受食品价格、机票价格以及对私立学校学费征收增值税的影响，英国 1 月份的通货膨胀率攀升至 10 个月以来的最高水平。【原文：UK inflation climbed to the highest level in 10 months in January, boosted by the cost of food, airfares and the imposition of value-added tax on private school fees.】

item.title: 投资者支持更多德国债券为国防和经济增长提供资金
item.description: 在人们对欧洲经济增长乏力和防御能力不足感到担忧之际，投资者在德国大选前向德国发出了一个明确的信息：还有更多的借贷空间。【原文：As fears over Europe’s anemic growth and defenses swirl, investors have a clear message for Germany ahead of its election: There’s room to borrow more.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国 1 月消费者物价涨幅超预期
斯托克兰德称，澳大利亚央行降息后住房市场将持续低迷
item.description: 澳大利亚房地产开发商Stockland Corp.的负责人表示，尽管需求有回升迹象，但高涨的房价和有限的供应量仍是购房者面临的重大障碍。【原文：The head of Australian property developer Stockland Corp. said elevated prices and limited supply remain significant hurdles to home buyers even as demand shows signs of picking up.】

item.title: Resonac 探讨可能收购 JSR 的交易结构
item.description: Resonac Holdings Corp. 正在研究可能收购政府拥有的芯片关键企业 JSR Corp. 的交易结构，这是该化学品生产商觊觎日本人工智能半导体材料市场的关键一步。【原文：Resonac Holdings Corp. is studying deal structures for a possible acquisition of government-owned chip linchpin JSR Corp., a key step in the chemicals maker’s ambition to corner the Japanese AI semiconductor materials market.】

item.title: 韩国考虑对部分钢铁产品采取反倾销措施
item.description: 韩国正在考虑对来自中国和日本的一些钢铁产品实施反倾销措施，因为人们担心廉价进口产品会竞争不过本地制造商。【原文：South Korea is considering enforcing anti-dumping measures on some steel products from China and Japan, amid concerns that cheap imports are out-competing local makers.】

item.title: 飞利浦订单量恢复增长，召回风波逐渐消退
item.description: 荷兰皇家飞利浦公司（Royal Philips NV）的年度订单量三年来首次出现增长，原因是这家荷兰医疗设备制造商主要解决了与睡眠呼吸机故障有关的问题。【原文：Royal Philips NV’s annual order intake increased for the first time in three years as the Dutch medical equipment maker mostly resolved issues related to its faulty sleep apnea machines.】

item.title: 资生堂独立连锁店入股后股价大涨
item.description: 在总部位于伦敦的投资者独立特许合伙人公司（Independent Franchise Partners）宣布入股这家日本化妆品公司后，资生堂株式会社的股价抹去了早些时候的跌幅，周三跳涨多达 12%，创下 2018 年 5 月以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Shiseido Co. shares erased earlier losses and jumped as much as 12%, the most since May 2018 on Wednesday, after London-based investor Independent Franchise Partners announced a stake in the Japanese cosmetics company.】

item.title: 英国贸易发展署称南非财政部计划采取措施抵消增值税增长
item.description: 据《商业日报》（Business Day）报道，南非国家财政部将采取一系列措施来抵消计划提高增值税对穷人造成的影响，但未引述任何人的说法。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury will use a series of measures to offset the impact on the poor from a planned increase in value-added tax, Business Day reported, without citing anyone.】

item.title: Binance CEO Teng 认为美国新政将为加密货币带来 "全新重启
item.description: Binance Holdings Ltd.首席执行官理查德-滕（Richard Teng）表示，唐纳德-特朗普总统领导下的美国已经摆脱了以 "有点压迫 "为标志的加密货币监管制度。【原文：The US under President Donald Trump has moved on from a crypto regulatory regime marked by “a bit of oppression”, according to Richard Teng, chief executive officer of Binance Holdings Ltd.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 公司正在商谈以 440 亿美元的估值进行融资
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，埃隆-马斯克的社交媒体公司 X（前身为 Twitter）正在洽谈以 440 亿美元的估值向投资者融资。【原文：X, Elon Musk’s social media company formerly known as Twitter, is in talks to raise money from investors at a $44 billion valuation, according to people familiar with the matter — the same price that Musk paid for the company in 2022.】

item.description:
